track.name: What Are You So Afraid Of

wiki.summary: “what are you so afraid of” is the final track from XXXTENTACION’s first posthumous album, SKINS. X questions the listener’s love choices and fears repeatedly as he may have believed love is a waste of time. X had dealt with heartbreak before with his ex-girlfriend, Geneva Ayala, who he started dating in 2014. After two years and multiple domestic violence claims from her, the couple broke up, causing X to feel broken. He wrote the song “Ayala (Outro)” about her on 17 expressing how he was hurt by her and regretted being with her. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “what are you so afraid of” is the final track from XXXTENTACION’s first posthumous album, SKINS. X questions the listener’s love choices and fears repeatedly as he may have believed love is a waste of time. X had dealt with heartbreak before with his ex-girlfriend, Geneva Ayala, who he started dating in 2014. After two years and multiple domestic violence claims from her, the couple broke up, causing X to feel broken. He wrote the song “Ayala (Outro)” about her on 17 expressing how he was hurt by her and regretted being with her. “before I close my eyes” has a similar guitar tone. Read more on Last.fm.
